headline: Devon Energy (DVN): Among the Best Undervalued Energy Stocks to Invest in Now
summary: We recently published a list of the 11 Best Undervalued Energy Stocks to Invest in Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Devon Energy Corporation (NYSE:DVN) stands against other undervalued energy stocks. On March 18, Tortoise Capital senior portfolio manager Rob Thummel appeared on CNBC’s ‘Squawk on the Street’ […]

headline: These Oil Stocks Can Thrive Even With Crude Prices Sinking
summary: Oil prices have tumbled this year.  Lower crude prices will impact oil company cash flows.  Three oil companies that can still thrive in the current environment are Devon Energy (NYSE: DVN), ConocoPhillips (NYSE: COP), and Chevron (NYSE: CVX).
